articles.title: Harry and Meghan’s ‘Oprah special’ shows that Britain is no longer their preferred audience - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: A schmaltzy Oprah interview will further alienate the Duke and Duchess from the British public, while delighting their new pals in Hollywood
articles.content:
To describe Harry and Meghan's decision to record a 90-minute CBS interview with Oprah Winfrey as controversial is like saying Brexit isnt an ideal topic to raise at a dinner party.
